name: DONT FALL OFF.
description:
This is my submission to Weekly Game Jam - Week 128, Camouflage. I interpreted camouflage kinda loosely as "blending into one's environment" to... well.. switching one's environment. So DONT FALL OFF was born. You play as Lopez, a cool guy with the power to switch between worlds on a whim. Good thing he can, too, because he's being chased off a perilous cliff!

Controls:

TAB - To switch between worlds.

Arrow keys - To move back and forth.
